Author: peony_cloud
Text: I want to do this. Or maybe a 95-calorie hard seltzer? Still don't think I can justify the calories/sugar/some intangible thing that tells me alcohol isn't on the list of acceptable foodstuffs. It's pure pleasure, is what it is — it doesn't fulfill any nutritional need. And I don't deserve stuff that's solely hedonistic. Maybe once I hit XX weight? (Welcome to my brain.) Ugh... But if I do let myself a drink after all, it'll be thanks to this post giving me permission. So, thank you! And cheers!?
